option(ENABLE_OpenraveYarpPluginLoader "Enable/disable OpenraveYarpPluginLoader" ON)

if(ENABLE_OpenraveYarpPluginLoader)

find_package(OpenRAVE REQUIRED)
find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(Boost ${OpenRAVE_Boost_VERSION} EXACT COMPONENTS iostreams python thread)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                    ${OpenRAVE_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                    ${YARP_INCLUDE_DIRS}
                    ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS})

link_directories(${OpenRAVE_LIBRARY_DIRS}
                 ${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

add_library(OpenraveYarpPluginLoader SHARED OpenraveYarpPluginLoader.cpp)

set_target_properties(OpenraveYarpPluginLoader PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS "${OpenRAVE_CXX_FLAGS}"
                                                          LINK_FLAGS "${OpenRAVE_LINK_FLAGS}")

target_link_libraries(OpenraveYarpPluginLoader ${YARP_LIBRARIES}
                                               ${OpenRAVE_LIBRARIES})

include(InstallOpenravePlugin)

install_openrave_plugin(OpenraveYarpPluginLoader)

endif()
